forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun casts a warm glow over the city, though its rays fight a gentle breeze that sways the trees and carries whispers from the bay. While temperatures hover comfortably at 65 degrees, they will dip a touch as the afternoon unfolds, offering a pleasant reprieve from everyday bustle. The air feels alive with the soft thrum of activity, though the golden hues of sunlight gradually yield to the quietly encroaching clouds—all signs of the serene evening to come. 

Tonight, the clouds will wrap the city in a cozy gray blanket, the cool air settling around 54 degrees. Those venturing outside might find themselves wanting a light jacket, as the wind offers a spirited reminder of the ocean’s proximity. Ideal pursuits may include a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or an intimate gathering with friends in the warmth of a café, where the sounds of laughter harmonize with the rustling leaves. Perhaps it’s a moment to indulge in a good book at one of the charming local bookstores, relishing the peaceful ambiance and the soft rustle of pages turning.
